short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Connect to popular Stacks dApps to experience the safe and seamless interaction with Asigna wallet.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Asigna is a native multisig solution tailored for Bitcoin and Stacks, designed specifically to offer an extra layer of security to trusted wallets in both ecosystems.

By using a native Stacks multisig approach, we address few of the primary concerns:
⍲ Eliminating potential risks associated with smart contracts.
⍲ Optimizing gas fees.
⍲ Using best multisig practices.
⍲ Integrating within Stacks dApps without any additional work from the multisig or dApps developers side.

Stacks dApps integration is implemented through Asigna Multisig Extension, that seamlessly interacts with sBTC, DEXes, marketplaces, and any dApp, tapping into the native capabilities of the Stacks blockchain to ensure maximum compatibility and accessibility for our users.

We guarantee the security of your assets by avoiding interactions with users' private keys, dealing exclusively with signatures from popular wallets like Leather, Xverse, and Unisat.

Please note that this extension is designed specifically for Stacks dApps integration.
